title: I’m Not Giving up on That Stage!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Hey, Mari-san, Rin thinks Rin knows the necessary training before parachuting.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Aaah, this is about that stage that μ’s did using our helicopters, right? I think you mentioned that you wanted to try parachuting. So, what’s the special training?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Bungee jumping nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Bungee jumping?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yeah nya! You might get scared because you have to jump down from a high place when parachuting, right? So we just need to practice jumping from high places!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wow! That sounds interesting! Can Mari tag along?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Of course nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ahahaha! Bungee Jumping is the best nya! So refreshing nya! Let’s do more, Mari-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>W-, wait, Rin! It’s our fifth time already! Mari can’t take it anymore~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
